help-file.title: LICH
help-file.content:
A Lich exists because of its own desires and the use of powerful and arcane magic. The Lich passes from a state of humanity to a non-living existence through both force of will, and from employing nearly forgotten and forbidden forms of necromancy. In life, Liches were mostly ultra powerful necromancers or clerics who, out of an intense fear of death, took advantage of an unholy opportunity to prolong their lives almost indefinitely by willingly making the transformation from living to undead. Although Liches can exist for many eons, eventually its life force will begin to wane, dooming the Lich to spend eternity roaming strange planes of existence unknown to even the wisest of sages.
Lich class list: Necromancer, Sorcerer, Warlock, Conjurer, Alchemist, Dreadlord, Unholy-Piper.
Lich stats: A Lich can appear as a skeleton at first glance, but they are covered by a very tight layer of dead and pallid skin. They are often covered with rotting but fine garments. Their eye sockets are black holes with glowing points of light in the center.
Lich innate abilities: Ultravision
